title: Champions League LIVE: Juventus, Real Madrid, Tottenham, Man City score, TV channel and live stream
text:
The Champions League is back as the group stages reach the halfway stage.

The third round of fixtures in the competition sees Manchester City and Tottenham flying the English flag at home to Atalanta and Red Star Belgrade respectively.

City are aiming to continue their perfect start in the competition, whilst Spurs are looking to bounce back from their 7-2 thrashing at the hands of Bayern Munich last time out.

There are two early kick-offs with Shakhtar Donetsk and Dinamo Zagreb kicking off at 17:55, the same time as Atletico Madrid vs Bayer Leverkusen.

The remaining six games kick-off at 8pm UK time, with Bayern Munich, Juventus and Paris Saint-Germain all in action.

It's also a big night for Real Madrid amid reports Zinedine Zidane could be facing the sack if they lost away to Turkish side Galatasaray.

Stay tuned for all the latest news and updates from all eight games on an important evening of Champions League action.
description: Follow all of the goals as they fly in around Europe in the latest round of Champions League fixtures
